QuestData.Title: Battle of the Crimson Watch
QuestData.Description: They are probably searching for you on the Path of Conquest as we speak. You must make your escape, $r!$B$BLeave me, I'm done for... They... I think I hear them coming. It's now or never! Get out! If you choose to stay, you will have to fight!$B$BIf you fight and somehow manage to survive, take what you have learned here and deliver that knowledge to A'dal in Shattrath City.
QuestData.LogDescription: Battle the forces of Illidan at Crimson Watch and survive!$B$BReturn to A'dal at Shattrath City should you emerge the victor.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to A'dal at Shattrath City in Terokkar Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: This Crimson Sigil will be investigated. They pose a threat to all life on Draenor. I foresee a day when their dark master has to answer for his crimes. Perhaps it will be you who brings him to justice, hero.
